title: Pals & Sals (PC)
brief_description: This CD ROM is designed for VCE language programmes in both primary and secondary settings. It contains excerpts of the 1996 PALS and SALS satellite broadcasts (as seen on Sofnet), and the materials contained meets Victorian LOTE CSF and VCE standards. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: Multimedia PC that includes a 386SX or higher, at least 4MB of RAM, 2.5MB of available hard disk space, CD-ROM drive, audio board and VGA or VGA+. MS DOS and Microsoft Windows operating system version 3.1 or later.
